doc.previous: In topology and related areas of mathematics a metrizable space is a topological space that is homeomorphic to a metric space That is a topological space is said to be metrizable if there is a metric
doc.after: such that the topology induced by d is Metrization theorems are theorems that give sufficient conditions for a topological space to be metrizable
